actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Federal Government Surveillance

official_title: To prohibit the sale and counterfeiting of Presidential inaugural tickets.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: Amends the federal criminal code to make it unlawful to knowingly and willfully sell or forge a ticket to a presidential inaugural ceremony or to use, unlawfully possess, or exhibit a forged ticket with the intent to defraud. Exempts the sale of tickets to a presidential inaugural ceremony that has already occurred or by an official presidential inaugural committee. Imposes a fine and/or prison term of up to one year for violations.

titles.title: To prohibit the sale and counterfeiting of Presidential inaugural tickets.
To prohibit the sale and counterfeiting of Presidential inaugural tickets.
